Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class I bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: Before both peptides, there is a 5-aa conserved region consisting of the consensus G(LV)E(AP)S. The sequence AYDGE terminates the patellamide A sequence and directly precedes the stop codon. Between the two patellamides, the 8-aa sequence AYDGVEPS seems to encode for both a start and stop cyclization sequence, with the consensus stop sequence being AYDG(EV).

Literature.Title: Patellamide A and C biosynthesis by a microcin-like pathway in Prochloron didemni, the cyanobacterial symbiont of Lissoclinum patella.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2005 May 17;102(20)7315-20.
Literature.Author: Schmidt EW, Nelson JT, Rasko DA, Sudek S, Eisen JA, Haygood MG, Ravel J.
